# Curve Data Double Choco

This is a mashup of [Curve Data](https://puzz.link/rules.html?curvedata) and [Double Choco](https://puzz.link/rules.html?dbchoco) - Each shape can be stretched as per regular Curve Data rules.  
Additionally, each shape can be rotated and/or reflected. Each shape that shows up in white must have a matching shape (up to rotation/reflection/regular Curve Data stretching) in grey, and vice-versa. 
The white and grey versions of each shape must be orthogonally adjacent at at least one grid square.  
All shapes have been given.

Click the image to solve on Penpa+.
[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2022/curveDataDoubleChoco1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
